ADESE.IS.summary: Adese Gayrimenkul Yatirim A.S. primarily engages in the retail of fruits and vegetables in Turkey. The company also offers meat and bakery products. In addition, it is also involved in the operation of shopping malls. The company was formerly known as Adese Alisveris Merkezleri Ticaret A.S. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
